verses.verse: לַמְנַצֵּ֥ח <S%H5329><s%> lam-natz-Tzecho the chief Musician בִּנְגִינֹ֗ת <S%H5068><s%> [Tbin-gi-Not, offer freely מִזְמ֥וֹר <S%H4210><s%> miz-Mor A Psalm שִֽׁיר׃ <S%H7892><s%> Shir. [or] Song אֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him, God יְחָנֵּ֥נוּ <S%H2603><s%> ye-chan-Ne-nu be merciful וִֽיבָרְכֵ֑נוּ <S%H1288><s%> vi-va-re-Che-nu; unto us and bless יָ֤אֵ֥ר <S%H215><s%> ya-'Er to shine פָּנָ֖יו <S%H6440><s%> pa-Nav us [and] cause his face אִתָּ֣נוּ <S%H854><s%> 'it-Ta-nu against סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. upon us Selah

לָדַ֣עַת <S%H3045><s%> la-Da-'at may be known בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz upon earth דַּרְכֶּ֑ךָ <S%H1870><s%> dar-Ke-cha; That thy way בְּכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> be-chol all גּ֝וֹיִ֗ם <S%H1471><s%> go-Yim, among all nations יְשׁוּעָתֶֽךָ׃ <S%H3444><s%> ye-shu-'a-Te-cha. thy saving health

יוֹד֖וּךָ <S%H3034><s%> yo-Du-cha praise עַמִּ֥ים׀ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim Let the people אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; thee O God י֝וֹד֗וּךָ <S%H3034><s%> yo-Du-cha, praise עַמִּ֥ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim let all the people כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam. all

יִֽשְׂמְח֥וּ <S%H8055><s%> yis-me-Chu be glad וִֽירַנְּנ֗וּ <S%H7442><s%> vi-ran-ne-Nu, and sing for joy לְאֻ֫מִּ֥ים <S%H3816><s%> le-'Um-Mim O let the nations כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> ki- for תִשְׁפֹּ֣ט <S%H8199><s%> tish-Pot for thou shalt judge עַמִּ֣ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim the people מִישׁ֑וֹר <S%H4334><s%> mi-Shor; righteously וּלְאֻמִּ֓ים׀ <S%H3816><s%> u-le-'um-Mim the nations בָּאָ֖רֶץ <S%H776><s%> ba-'A-retz upon earth תַּנְחֵ֣ם <S%H5148><s%> tan-Chem and govern סֶֽלָה׃ <S%H5542><s%> Se-lah. Selah

יוֹד֖וּךָ <S%H3034><s%> yo-Du-cha praise עַמִּ֥ים׀ <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim Let the people אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; thee O God י֝וֹד֗וּךָ <S%H3034><s%> yo-Du-cha, praise עַמִּ֥ים <S%H5971><s%> 'am-Mim let all the people כֻּלָּֽם׃ <S%H3605><s%> kul-Lam. all

אֶ֭רֶץ <S%H776><s%> 'E-retz [Then] shall the earth נָתְנָ֣ה <S%H5414><s%> na-te-Nah yield יְבוּלָ֑הּ <S%H2981><s%> ye-vu-Lah; her increase יְ֝בָרְכֵ֗נוּ <S%H1288><s%> ye-va-re-Che-nu, shall bless אֱלֹהִ֥ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him [and] God אֱלֹהֵֽינוּ׃ <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei-nu. [even] our own God

יְבָרְכֵ֥נוּ <S%H1288><s%> ye-va-re-Che-nu shall bless אֱלֹהִ֑ים <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him; God וְיִֽירְא֥וּ <S%H3372><s%> ve-yi-re-'U shall fear אֹ֝ת֗וֹ <S%H853><s%> o-To, כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אַפְסֵי־ <S%H657><s%> 'af-sei- us and all the ends אָֽרֶץ׃ <S%H776><s%> 'A-retz. of the earth
